text:
Healthie | Senior Software Engineer (Ruby) | New York, NY | Full-time, onsite Healthie (Techstars NY '16) is an all-in-one practice management platform for nutrition professionals. We've closed our seed round and are looking to bring on a senior software engineer to work on scaling, performance, new features, and mentoring our junior developers.

Our stack: Ruby, Rails, Postgres, Swift, Java

please apply by sending an email to cavan@gethealthie.com
